Posts.Content: Jun 26, 2013 11:46AM KSTeacher wrote: Sarahmento, your lump sounds just like mine. I had a US guided biopsy last Tuesday. It went very good. The only part that hurt was when the radiologist injected the lidocaine. I had my results in 2 days (benign), but the waiting was hard. Try to keep busy, keep your mind occupied on anything else. I still have pain in my lumpy breast too. I am waiting for another MRI. I will keep you in my prayers.
